mapper.sql: student_id, student_name, class_id, user_id, student_identity, student_sex, student_address, student_age, student_ancestral, student_tel, student_status, shooolmoney_status, loans_status, student_info
mapper.select:
select s.student_id,s.student_name,s.student_sex,s.student_age,s.student_tel,s.student_identity,s.student_address,s.student_status,s.student_info,s.loans_status,s.shooolmoney_status,ts.* ,tc.class_name,tc.class_id from t_student s left join t_score ts on s.student_id=ts.student_id left join t_class tc on s.class_id=tc.class_id where 1=1
and student_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{studentName},'%'))
select t.*,tc.class_name,ts.score,ts.score_course from t_student t,t_class tc,t_score ts where t.class_id=tc.class_id and t.student_id=ts.student_id and t.student_id=#{studentId}
select s.student_id,s.student_name,sc.score_course,sc.score from t_student s,t_score sc where s.student_id=sc.student_id
select ts.student_name,tsu.`PASSWORD` from t_student ts,t_sys_user tsu where ts.user_id=tsu.userid

select ts.student_id,ts.student_name,tc.class_name,ts.student_sex,ts.student_age,ts.student_status,ts.loans_status,ts.shooolmoney_status,tsc.score from t_student ts,t_class tc,t_score tsc where ts.class_id=tc.class_id and ts.student_id=tsc.student_id and tc.class_id=#{classId}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_student
student_id,
student_name,
class_id,
user_id,
student_identity,
student_sex,
student_address,
student_age,
student_ancestral,
student_tel,
student_status,
shooolmoney_status,
loans_status,
student_info,
score_id,

mapper.update:
update t_student
student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_identity = #{studentIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student_sex = #{studentSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
student_address = #{studentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student_age = #{studentAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_ancestral = #{studentAncestral,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student_tel = #{studentTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student_status = #{studentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shooolmoney_status = #{shooolmoneyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loans_status = #{loansStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_info = #{studentInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score_id = #{scoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_student set student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_identity = #{studentIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_sex = #{studentSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, student_address = #{studentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_age = #{studentAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_ancestral = #{studentAncestral,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_tel = #{studentTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_status = #{studentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shooolmoney_status = #{shooolmoneyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loans_status = #{loansStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_info = #{studentInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score_id = #{scoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
